title: Network
description: A social network app built by Django to make, like and comment on posts as well as following other users.

title: Roama
description: A simple social networking app built by React to make posts, search for friends and like and comment on posts. There is also a translator API to a wide range of languages.

title: CalEvent
description: An app to search event types based on user input. Including a suggested events feature, google search feature and extra joke generator for fun.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather dashboard app to fetch 5 day weather forecast from open weather API.

title: Coding Quiz
description: A simple coding quiz app where the user is presented with code related questions that need to be answered with in the time limit.
